title: Fiora's passive.
body:
I don't really mind this at all but has anyone realized that it's pretty much impossible to ambush as Fiora or like do the 'waiting in brush looking for the perfect time to gank' thing because even though shes in the brush, enemies know shes nearby because they got a big red circle around their body.

Warwicks allowed to turn his 'e' off to stop things like this from happening, shouldn't Fiora as well ? Or at least make it so enemies can't see the big red circle when Fiora is in a brush, or is it fine the way it is now.

Just curious.

replies.body: I think it only shows for them if they have vision of you.

I think so yeah, just realised.
Like how are you supposed to identify their weak spots when you can't even see them xD
When your playing against a fiora, her passive doesn't show for you...

Um yes it does.

When I was playing as miss fortune I was happily split pushing bot until I saw a big red circle around me, didn't see any fiora in site so I immediately backed off.
Walked into a bush and BAM, she was there and went ham on me, luckily hecarim saved me.
